nodes.text: Nifera Shu was the wife of influential Corellian businessman Hasadar Shu, and a benefactor for the Collective. When the Collective acquired a stolen list of First Order targets and prisoners, Shu held an auction to sell it to the highest bidder. The First Order learned of the auction and interfered, killing Hasadar Shu. Nifera, while distraught with grief, provided the Resistance with the list after they helped her escape and paid her an amount of credits.
